name: Coding Agent Tools Manifest
description: Unified tool definitions including names, descriptions, parameters, and categories

list_files.description: List all files with metadata (id, path, updated_at). Typically, this is the first tool you call to load the file structure.

wildcard_search.description: Multi-term search across all files. Returns ranked results by match count. Use for finding files by concept.

query.description: Enter comma-separated search terms to find files by concept

search.description: Search file paths and content by single keyword.

keyword.description: Single keyword to search in file paths and content

read_file.description: Read complete content of a single file. Returns content WITH LINE NUMBERS prefixed as <<N>>. Can use file_id OR path parameter. Path is more reliable because file_id can change when files are created, edited, or moved.

file_id.description: UUID of file from list_files result

path.description: File path for session-created files (alternative to file_id)

edit_lines.description: This is one of the most important tools. Use this tool with specific line range in a file and stage the change. Use line numbers from <<N>> prefix in read_file output. Can use file_id OR path parameter (preferred).

file_id.description: UUID of file from list_files result

path.description: File path for session-created files (alternative to file_id)

start_line.description: Starting line number (1-based, from <<N>> prefix in read_file)

new_content.description: Replacement content for the specified line range

create_file.description: Create new file and stage as add operation.

path.description: Full path for the new file (e.g., 'src/components/NewComponent.tsx')

content.description: Complete content for the new file

delete_file.description: Delete file and stage as delete operation.

file_id.description: UUID of file to delete from list_files result

path.description: File path to delete (alternative to file_id)

move_file.description: Move or rename file to a new path (handles directory moves properly).

file_id.description: UUID of file to move from list_files result

new_path.description: New path for the file (handles directory moves properly)

get_staged_changes.description: View all currently staged changes. Essential for avoiding duplicate edits and understanding current state before making changes.

unstage_file.description: Discard a specific staged change by file_path. Use when user requests reverting a file or when a change needs to be redone.

file_path.description: File path to unstage (discard staged change)

discard_all_staged.description: Discard ALL staged changes. Use with EXTREME CAUTION - only when user explicitly requests full reset.

project_inventory.description: Returns counts and brief previews for ALL project elements in one call. Use this when you need to understand something about the project. You'll see this project has artifacts, requirements, canvas nodes and edges, and a range of other key artifacts.

project_category.description: Load ALL items from a specific category with full details. Categories: requirements, chat_sessions, standards, tech_stacks, artifacts, canvas_nodes, etc.

category.description: Category name: requirements, chat_sessions, standards, tech_stacks, artifacts, canvas_nodes, etc.

project_elements.description: Load SPECIFIC elements by their IDs with full details. Pass array of {category, id} pairs.

elements.description: Array of {category, id} pairs to fetch specific elements
